definitions.definition: in the most important ways, without considering things that are less important

examples.text: I think we are **basically saying** the same thing.
There have been some problems but basically it's a good system.
The growth in productivity **basically means** companies are getting more work out of fewer people.
The two approaches are basically very similar.

definitions.definition: used when you are giving your opinion or stating what is important about a situation

examples.text: Basically, there's not a lot we can do about it.
He basically just sits there and does nothing all day.
Well, basically I did not believe anything he told me.
